@notice basic implementation of the Staking Mechanism for Niko Token
 @author Thal Marcelin

@dev initializes a new Staking Rewards instance
 @param _tokenAddress     initial supply of NKO

@notice a method to get the total user stked token
 @return uint256 the aggregated stakes from all stakeholders.

@dev a method for a stakeholder to create a stake.
 @param _stake The size of the stake to be created.

@notice  method for a stakeholder to remove a stake.
 @param _stake The size of the stake to be removed.

@notice  to add a stakeholder.
 @param _stakeHolder The stakeholder to add.

@notice to remove a stakeholder.
 @param _stakeHolder the stakeholder to remove.

@notice A method to allow a staker to check his rewards.
 @param _stakeHolder The stakeholder to check rewards for.

@notice A method to the sum the rewards from all stakeholders.
 @return uint256 The aggregated rewards from all stakeholders.

@notice A  method that calculates the rewards for each stakeholder.
 @param _stakeHolder The stakeholder to calculate rewards for.
@notice to distribute rewards to all stakeholders.
@notice to allow a stakeholders to withdraw their rewards.

constructor.details: initializes a new Staking Rewards instance

createStake(uint256).details: a method for a stakeholder to create a stake.

params._stake: The size of the stake to be created.

params._stakeHolder: The stakeholder to check rewards for.

getStakes(address).details: retrieve the stake for a stakeholder.

params.stakeHolder: The stakeholder to retrieve the stake for.

returns._0: uint256 the amount of Niko staked.
uint256 The aggregated rewards from all stakeholders.
uint256 the aggregated stakes from all stakeholders.
bool, uint256 whether the address is a stakeholder, and if yes its position in the stakeholders array.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._stake: The size of the stake to be removed.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimRewards().notice: to allow a stakeholders to withdraw their rewards.

distributeRewards().notice: to distribute rewards to all stakeholders.

getRewards(address).notice: A method to allow a staker to check his rewards.

getTotalOwedRewards().notice: A method to the sum the rewards from all stakeholders.

getTotalStakes().notice: a method to get the total user stked token

isStakeHolder(address).notice: function to check if an address is already a stakeholder

removeStake(uint256).notice: method for a stakeholder to remove a stake.

userdoc.notice: basic implementation of the Staking Mechanism for Niko Token
